extensionDescription.message: Disables or enables the animation of images (usually animateg GIF).

button_title.description: Text displayed next to button or as tooltip of the button

title_enabled.description: Text displayed in the title if anigifs are ON.

title_disabled.description: Text displayed in the title if anigifs are OFF.

autoreload_label.message: Automatically reload current page on toggle
autoreload_label.description: Label for auto reload checkbox in the options page
